original_title: เพลงสุดท้าย
overview: This Thai film broke barriers as the first to narrate a queer story and first to star a trans person. It follows the tragic life of a trans performer at a cabaret who falls in love with a handsome male singer who leaves her for a cisgender woman. Highlighting the difficulties of being trans in Thai society, the queer drama sparked a national discussion and spawned a 2006 remake.
title: The Last Song
